text:
Elizabeth Hubbard (born December 22, 1933) is an American actress. She is best known for her role as Dr. Althea Davis on "The Doctors" (1964-69, 1970-78, 1981-82) and powerful businesswoman Lucinda Walsh on "As the World Turns" (1984-2010).
She also played roles on "The Edge of Night", "One Life to Live", and "Guiding Light".
